resources.string: Jetpack Compose is a modern toolkit for building native Android Ui compose simplifies ans accelerates Ui development on Android with less code, powerful tools, and intuitive Kotlin APIs

In this tutorial, you build a simple UI component with declarative function. you call Compose functions to say what you want and the Compose compiler does the rest. Compose is built around Composable functions. These functions let you define your app\'s UI programmatically because the let data dependencies, rather than focus on the process of the UI\'s construction, such as initializing and element ant then attaching it to a parent. To create a Composable function, you add the @Composable annotation to the function name Jetpack Compose tutorial
Displays text and follows the recommended Material Design guidelines.
Creates a composable that lays out and draws a given Painter class object
still Life of Blue Rose and Other Flowers
